name: Curse of Vanishing
description:
A one screen puzzle game where your weapons vanish after a couple of steps

Controls:

    WASD to move

    Left-Click to use weapon

    R to Restart

    Shortsword:

        Left-Click on an enemy one square away

    Bow:

        Left-Click one square away from the  player to fire in the direction you                          would like to 

Music: Teller of Tales by Kevin Macleod

Assets Used: https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-rpg-pack

Made for Weekly Game Jam 160

Sorry to macOS and linux users but GameMaker won't allow me to export to those platforms unless I own them.
